name: G-Mode Archives 26: Ore no Sentai Oranger
summary:
I'll make the next hero!
Become the commander of the Hero Squadron and protect the peace on Sunday morning!

"Ore no Sentai Oranger" is a training simulation game that nurtures the hero squadron.

Each of the five members of the squadron has their own personality, age and gender.
In addition to normal physical techniques, I will master "special moves" that make use of my specialty, such as a ike-face attack that shoots the hearts of moms.

The growth of the Oranger was confirmed by the battle with the enemy in the Sunday morning program and sales (children's festival).

Cultivate a squadron according to the fan base, and compete with other heroes for the popularity ranking and aim for the first place.
It's up to you how you enjoy it. Let's grow your favorite squadron!
